description: Ministry of Urban Development, Water Supply and Drainage - Order to approve the acquisition of the immovable properties in Omaragolla, Ibbagamuwa D/S Division, Kurunegala District for the constructions under Melsiripura Water Supply Project and in Dhadallagama, Galle Four Gravets D/S Division, Galle District for the constructions under the Galle Urban Boundary Waste Water Recucle Project and in Kiulegedara, Kandaketiya D/S Division, Badulla District for the constrution in Okkampitiya, Buttala D/S Division, Moneragala District for the constructions under Moneragala-Buttala Integrated Water Supply Scheme
